medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal discomfort and dark-colored loose stools.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began several days prior to admission, following the patient watching a game and feeling poorly that night. The patient reports generalized weakness, poor PO intake, and fatigue without nausea, vomiting, fevers, or chills. Describes stools as like black cream.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation on warfarin, ovarian cyst, osteoarthritis, hypertension, GERD, history of GI bleed (gastric ulcer), stress urinary incontinence, status post hysterectomy, status post appendectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with some kind of gynecologic malignancy (patient unsure which), high blood pressure in mother.
